column4: Anybody want to confirm something relatively easy?  I want to know if it's *actually* a bug before I report it.
Check if you do have "Movie Player" in... Applications --> Sounds & Videos --> ...... and if you do... now... Go to System --> Preferences --> Main Menu..... Try and toggle that off.
Really?  I can't untoggle Movie Player off.  It's not even in the list.  Intrepid amd64.  You?
sorry wrong nick on the last one
Ahh.  Any idea how I can get rid of broken link -- Movie Player in the main menu?
try 'pkill gnome-panel' to restart your panel
